txt.en: <rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Forge a multi-purpose toolkit for the people of Wildermore ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A skilled metalsmith such as yourself can help the refugees of Wildermore by forging a multi-purpose toolkit for them.

'I hear that you are gifted at working with metals, [placeholder]. Would you be willing to forge something for the refugees of Wildermore?\n\n'A set of tools would surely help the builders to repair the damage that has been done. Is this something you can make?'
Hildelith has given you a recipe for a multi-purpose toolkit.\n\nYou should forge a multi-purpose toolkit for the refugees who hope to start rebuilding Wildermore.
'Ah! This is wonderful, [placeholder]. I have never seen such advanced, finely-crafted tools. These will work better than the rusty and broken things the people have been trying to use up 'til now.'
Deliver the multi-purpose toolkit to Hildelith
Hildelith is in Forlaw.\n\nYou have crafted a multi-purpose toolkit, and should now deliver it to Hildelith.
